name: Infected (Studio Centauri, dram2, fyeD, sourav095, pb, apsingh, rajpootkn)
name_original: Infected (Studio Centauri, dram2, fyeD, sourav095, pb, apsingh, rajpootkn)
description:
A deadly virus is threatening to take over the world, and it is up to you to kill it!

Play across four unique levels and annihilate all enemies to proceed.

Note: This game is in early access and it still being actively worked on. Source can be found here.

Instructions:
  1. Aim with the mouse and use the left click to shoot
  2. Move with the arrow keys, jump with the UP key
  3. Kill all enemies in the level to proceed to the next
